text: Milton James Ballantyne (5 November 1928 â€“ 15 December 2015) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the Country Liberal Party. He served as a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly for Nhulunbuy from 1974 to 1980. Ballantyne died on 15 December 2015, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Members of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly
title: Milton Ballantyne
